listings.name: Clementine Clock
listings.description: Be able to tell time while staring into the abyss of an extremely tasty orange time-telling device that actually isn't orange or a mandarin but actually a clementine. What is a clementine you may ask? Well I honestly don't know what to tell you, a clementine can have many meanings depending on the culture but typically in western english-speaking countries that have 50 states they are basically the same thing as oranges. Where do they differ you may ask? Well I'd have to google that but I don;t currently have an internet connection. Hopefully this lenghty description didn't mess with your formatting! ;) #clock #orange #wdb #long

reviews.content: This clock can only exist in 4 possible futures.
reviews.author: doctor_stange
